channel.title: Python on ysyy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on ysyy's blog

item.title: conda
item.description: # 查看环境 conda env list # 创建环境 conda create -n py3 python=3.6 # 通过yml文件创建环境 conda env create -f environment.yml # 激活环境 conda activate py3 # 退出环境 conda deactivate # 删除环境 conda remove -n py3 --all 迁移时可能会出现pi

item.title: poetry
item.description: poetry 出现的错误及解决方法 poetry install 时Failed to create the collection: Prompt dismissed 解决方案: 关闭keyring python3 -m keyring --disable 原因: https://github.com/python-poetry/poetry/issues/1917
